From: ' (USANYS)"  
To: " (USANYS)" < 
>, " 
(USANYS)" 
Subject: FW: Epstein FOIA Requests 
Date: Mon, 16 Sep 2019 16:20:30 +0000 
Attachments: Sigrid_S_McCawley_2019-003550 July_Ist_corr.pdf; SigridMcCawley8-27-19.pdf 
FYI, we have a  bunch of FOIA requests for our Epstein investigation, including a couple from Boies Schiller on 
behalf of their client I  expect we will be asserting the ongoing investigation exemption as to all of them, 
including BS's, altho it  is possible that may be entitled to some additional information as relates 
specifically to her. Let me know if you want to discuss. 
From: 
Sent: Friday, September 13, 2019 8:59 AM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: Epstein FOIA Requests 
We have just received 4 new FOIA requests relating to the Epstein case: 
UEOUSA-2019-003715 —  Merris Badcock — WPTV —  West Palm Beach, FL 
Electronic request - Any and all records related to Jeffrey Epstein. This would include, but not be limited to any and all 
records from 2005 (or sooner). 
UEOUSA-2019-004234 —  Douglas Montero —  American Media, Inc. 
Electronic request - All files, photographs, videos and audio recordings pertaining to the July 6, 2019 SDNY indictment of 
Jeffrey Epstein — DOB 1-1953. 
EOUSA-2019-04387 — Sigrid McCawley -  BOIES SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
See attached - Multi district request. 2-parts. Part 1— Records concerning their client Part 2 —  All 
records concerning the now deceased Jeffrey Epstein. 
UEOUSA-2019-3550 — Sigrid McCawley —  BOIES SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
See attached - Copies of entire file for any and all matters involving SDNY pertaining in any way to investigations, 
complaints, or allegations regarding or relating to Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, 
Mark Epstein, and others (see attached). 
Wondering if you and want to consult with the trial team about what is releasable before 
There is also a Fifth request in the pipeline and I would guess others to follow. 
and I speak with 
EFTA00032429

EFTA00032430
